name: Claw Hero
description:
Tap to stretch your hands *ahem* CLAWS and grab enemies! Tap again to throw away enemies. Get creative: Use explosives, spiky objects and many more to increase damage! Save the hostages and destroy others with your chain claw.

Tough day? Had to endure nonsense conversations and want to knock some heads together? you literally can! Go ahead, let off some steam!


Game Features

Reach out to your target and pull them to only eject further! Grab and throw with style!


Challenges

Be smart enough to make most of your surroundings.. Catch explosives and sharp-edged crates to eliminate many enemies at once! Maybe you can even use dead bodies! Explore possibilities, become a master of your surroundings.


Different Claws

Choose from different skins and customize your claw!


Different Modes

Choose from special powers to boost up your claw! Want to electrocute your enemies? Try it out!


Daily Missions

You master at beating them? Wanna become a hero? Join the daily quests and test yourself!


Let us know what you think, got more ideas? Share!

We hope you have fun time playing Claw Hero; grabbing, throwing, eliminating enemies in various ways. Enjoy!
